sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects modification of autostart extensibility point (ASEP) in registry.
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Victor Sergeev, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Gleb Sukhodolskiy, Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community, Tim Shelton, frack113 (split)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the creation of an executable by another executable
sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Creation of an Executable by an Executable

attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v2.0 to extract, compression method=deflate

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET POLICY HTTP traffic on port 443 (POST)
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET 443 (msg:"ET POLICY HTTP traffic on port 443 (POST)"; flow:to_server,established; http.method; content:"POST"; http.header; content:!".etrade.com|3a|443|0d 0a|"; classtype:bad-unknown; sid:2013926; rev:10; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, tls_state plaintext, created_at 2011_11_18, deployment Perimeter, former_category POLICY, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2024_03_12;)

alert http any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA HTTP Request line incomplete"; flow:established,to_server; app-layer-event:http.request_line_incomplete; flowint:http.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2221042; rev:1;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ip any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA Applayer Detect protocol only one direction"; flow:established; app-layer-event:applayer_detect_protocol_only_one_direction; flowint:applayer.anomaly.count,+,1; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2260002; rev:1;)
